alert.note: Alert for Morton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 22 at 6:28PM CDT until April 23 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MORTON AND NORTHWESTERN STEVENS COUNTIES... At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Feterita, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public reported quarter hail in Rolla at 6:27 PM. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Morton and northwestern Stevens Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
